website_summaries.verdict: A top-rated vitamin, mineral, and probiotic support for new moms.
pros: Fermented probiotic formula doesn't upset stomach
cons: Contains soy, which is an allergen to some breastfed newborns
Though in the minority, some experience decrease in milk supply

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase If Nursing
customer_reviews.text: My milk supply decreased to almost nothing while taking this medicine. It took a few days to pinpoint that it was this supplement. In those days, I was pumping 10x daily, plus breastfeeding a few times daily, power pumping, etc. My supply should have increased, even by a little, but my oz produced kept diminishing. After 48 hours of discontinuing, my supply has come back and now is increasing.
customer_reviews.author: smargavio

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: These were terrible. They tasted bad, you have to take 3 a day and ultimately it gave my LO very bad gas and vomiting. Discontinued immediately and returned. Too bad!
customer_reviews.author: LuvnMaddie

customer_reviews.title: Pills have herbs in them which can affect milk supply
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I thought that my body would have different needs after giving birth and I didn't realize that I could just continue with my prenatals. I really wish I would've researched this more. This product contains lemon balm which is an herb known to decrease milk supply. I don't know why it is included, but when I stopped taking these, my supply noticeably increased. DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS FOR BREASTFEEDING MOTHERS. Just continue with your prenatal vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: talula31

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR BREASTFEEDING MAMAS STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what I was thinking when I bought this product. I normally read ahead but I must’ve been in a jab for time and sleep deprived and I bought these pills. I was taking them for 2 days only (17th and 18th) and I immediately noticed an enormous amount of decrease in my breast milk. Please do not take these if you’re a nursing mama and want to continue your flow.
customer_reviews.author: AkMini

customer_reviews.title: but they don't have good amount of Biotin
customer_reviews.text: I was using Natures Made pre-natal and postnatal, but they don't have good amount of Biotin. My hair started to fall for longer time after birth. My son is soon to be 2 and I have been started to wean him. I have noticed that ever since I purchased these vitamins, my nails and hair started to grow again. My nails have been stronger and don't break as they used to. Definitely recommend these for post-natal and nursing mamas.
customer_reviews.author: APEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Best when nursing
customer_reviews.text: I have taken vitamins for years and years, tried lots of different kinds. These are the first ones that have made a noticeable difference in how I feel, mostly when I wake up in the morning. I take my vitamin at night, and I am able to wake up easier and I have more energy. Which is a huge contrast to the mornings after I have forgotten my vitamin! Easy to swalow, no gagging, no taste. Thank you New Chapter!
customer_reviews.author: Bargesnockles

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if breastfeeding🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I went from over producing milk to having just barely enough to feed my son....he was also the calmest, happiest baby until I started taking these....now he is soooooo fussy and his little belly is so upset. Will stop taking these and go back to my trusty prenatals😑 Update: Only took these for 4 days, my baby got so constipated and screamed because he didn’t have enough milk, took my prenatals on day 5 and he pooped 4 times and my milk supply doubled!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, not great formula for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used New Chapter a lot but I was not impressed with this particular formula. It may be coincidence due to other factors but they do not boost my energy at all and in fact I’ve had significantly much less. 3 times a Day is quite a bit as well. It’s hard to remember to take one that many times. I had stopped nursing around the time I took them and I noticed it did keep my production up for quite a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: N3lli3

customer_reviews.title: My baby and I are allergic To something in the vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of the. Ew chapter vitamins. I used the prenatal vitamins from new chapter before so I thought I can’t go wrong with the post natal one for sure. Boy... was I wrong! I started the vitamins few days ago and ever since then I’m getting allergic reactions and gassy while my baby is going through the same thing... so I cancelled the subscription.
customer_reviews.author: AsburyNJ

customer_reviews.title: Affects Milk Supply!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are nursing be very wary of this product! I noticed within two days that my milk supply was way down...according to other reviews the lemon balm in it may do that!! It may have good ingredients but apparently not for lactation even though it advertises it that way. I really thought this was a good product for postnatal health and lactation ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Calli K

customer_reviews.title: Tanked my supply
customer_reviews.text: I too didn’t read the reviews because I saw this recommended in a fb group and looking at the ingredients it looked great! However after two days my supply completely tanked!! I even noticed a drop after day one! It’s horrible don’t use this if breastfeeding!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: If you take their prenatal, you’ll love this!
customer_reviews.text: Loved that their Prenatals contain folate and probiotics! So it only made sense I continued on with taking their postnatals! I really believe these are what helped get through postpartum blues/depression. I had it pretty bad with my last two pregnancies. Just wish it was higher in vitamin D3 since I’m breastfeeding!
customer_reviews.author: Luc V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my breastfeeding journey
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow. No funky aftertaste. No upset stomach. LOVE that it includes folate with only a small amount of folic acid when so many are only folic acid. Will continue to use this brand until I am done with my breastfeeding journey. I have been using them for 9 months so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: Do not take if breastfeeding!
customer_reviews.text: Very dissappointed. These say they are good for Lactation support but my oversupply has now so dramatically decreased that my baby who was eating for 15-30 minutes every 3 hours is eating every hour hungry and draining the breast I’m about 5 minutes. Once I stopped taking these my supply came back. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Bergeson

customer_reviews.title: Energy boost for tired mama
customer_reviews.text: This has given me a boost of energy I need while pumping for my lo. Also is gave me the vitamins my body needs and helped me produce more milk. Very pleased with these postnatal vitamins and would recommend for anyone that is nursing or pumping for their lo. Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Full of great vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these to replace the sams brand I was taking. I like these better, been taking them for a couple months. They have more vitamins and more of each vitamin than the previous one I was taking! Doesn’t upset my stomach, I can take on an empty stomach with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase if nursing!
customer_reviews.text: Do not take this while nursing! Gave me horrible pms-like symptoms starting on day 1. Also made my infant spit up all day long and cry in pain from gas. This was literally the only thing that changed in my routine and I’m horrified of the side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B.

customer_reviews.title: Increased energy BUT also increased tummy issues
customer_reviews.text: I liked these vitamins because I felt like I had more energy while taking them, but it made me and my baby extremely gassy with diarrhea (and fussy on her end). I’ve stopped taking them for about a week and our gas and her fussiness are completely gone. It’s a shame though because I’ve definitely noticed my energy dropping since switching to a different vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Conner Belnap

customer_reviews.title: Overall I feel like there are less expensive brands that are just as good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see an increase or decrease in milk supply while taking these postnatal. Hard to say if helped with energy or mood as having a newborn is exhausting and hormones are still going crazy. They were however easy to swallow and did not have a bad taste. They are soy based so I had to discontinue use of them because of a medication my son was put on he was not able to have soy. Overall I feel like there are less expensive brands that are just as good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: good vitamins
customer_reviews.text: i liked these vitamins. I don't think they affected my milk supply in any way though. I did notice that i had more energy when i took them vs when i didn't
customer_reviews.author: Dana (Frost) Cubano

customer_reviews.title: I wanted them to work so bad. Almost completely lost my milk supply this time
customer_reviews.text: Started and stopped these three times. I wanted them to work so bad. Almost completely lost my milk supply this time. Just beware and and prepared to take action if your milk supply drops too. I would honestly just suggest taking something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Crispin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I will always use this brand, been using it for 14 years and counting. Never had an issue with them, Great product
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: WOnderful for nursing moms
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamin for nursing mom. Has a bit of a smell to it, but I wasn't affected by it. Loved that it is a whole food vitamin and works for lactating moms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't notice a difference.
customer_reviews.text: I exclusively breastfed for 4 months and started taking these right away. I still had to work pretty hard at breastfeeding. Didn't makey flow any better or worse. Take it or leave it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Wilson-Ball

customer_reviews.title: Natural folate, great!
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamin. After a lot of research I can across New Chapter. I like the organic ingredients as well as the natural folate. Knowing that I am consuming a quality vitamin is important. I can take them without eating which is good with a new baby.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Chervony

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I used this same brand of prenatal vitamins so I decided to try these post natal as well. I like that you can take in empty stomach..I feel a have a bit more energy when I do take 3 a day. Downside is you have to remember to take 3 a day
customer_reviews.author: Mochamom19

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awful
customer_reviews.text: Used post birth while nursing and taking low dose SSRI. Made my head feel funny and definitely did NOT help my milk supply. Stopped taking it and felt myself again. Maybe was messing with my meds? Awful and so sad reading the reviews after I had problems and didn't think to read them beforehand. Just awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing supportive supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using these for Postnatal support. I swear they have helped keep my supply up, I paired with a fish oil pill since they don’t have that ingredient included. When I run out of a bottle I notice my milk lessening and then once I start taking again it goes back up! Also my hair has not fallen out at all and my baby is now 9 months old. I feel like this supplement has helped keep it that way!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: All time fav
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time fav brand for prenatal and postnatal vitamins. It’s easy to swallow, and can truly be taken on an empty stomach without causing upset. Also increases milk supply and gives me lots of energy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Definitely feel better
customer_reviews.text: They work..takes a week or two to feel the difference just like any vitamins. I like it that there is 3 a day because I feel like it gives you a little boost towards the end of the day when you feel drained. Good price. Reordered again.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Do not take if breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: Completely depleted my milk supply! I took the prenatal throughout my entire pregnancy and loved it. So disappointed the brand would sell a postnatal that affects milk production!
customer_reviews.author: E DAVIE

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle- broken vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 boxes. The first product came in with half of the pills broken into pieces. I finished that bottle and then opened my second (after the return time had passed) This one came with the glass bottle completely shattered inside the box so I had to throw the whole box away. These are not cheap vitamins so I am not very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Beware of possible milk supply decrease!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking these for 4 days now and noticed major drop in milk supply!!
customer_reviews.author: Plamena

customer_reviews.title: Not for Breastfeeding Moms
customer_reviews.text: This product caught my eye because I'd been looking for a high quality vitamin while breastfeeding. I noticed an increase in energy and improved mood while on these vitamins. However, I noticed a significant decrease in my milk supply. I went from pumping 15-16 oz during my 8-hour work period to pumping 10 oz. I would recommend this product to postpartum moms who are NOT breastfeeding.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this line of vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Love this line of vitamins. I used this brand throughout my pregnancy and now post-natal. These were the only vitamins that did not make me ill or I could not use over many months. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: a girl has no name

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Post-Partum Support
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredient list full of top notch supplements to support post-party’s needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent post natal supplement
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are whole food vitamins that include gentle ingredients to promote lactation. I love that they are easy to digest even on an empty stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This brand is my favorite. I definitely see the increase in milk supply.
customer_reviews.author: Ahli

customer_reviews.title: Like them
customer_reviews.text: I took these for a year after my daughter was born while I was nursing. They were fine for my milk supply. I liked that they were organic and that you don’t have to take them with food. I recently found my old bottle (my daughter is now a little over 2) and I started taking them and I noticed how they made my hair thick and my skin nice. I just ordered more. They’re a bit expensive but I just consider them a beauty product.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: The only con is trying to remember to take the pills throughout the day, unless you take them all at once..
customer_reviews.author: Jeriberi93

customer_reviews.title: Best whole food postnatal, great price
customer_reviews.text: Love these for the whole food ingredients, no bad aftertaste
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle contained multiple broken vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering for the past six months but my last shipment contained more than 20 broken vitamin pieces. Didn’t get my money’s worth this time around.
customer_reviews.author: EWC526

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these!! Have tried everything for my postpartum hair loss and these really helped ! And I take em on an empty stomach in am before work .. no issues!! Love love .. and just ordered 4 more bottles in case they run out on Amazon lol
customer_reviews.author: doctormom

customer_reviews.title: No nausea!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely amazing and I noticed a huge difference while taking them. I couldn't even take prenatals bc they made me sick. These didn't. Loved that you could spread the dosage out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for postpartum hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I started experiencing the postpartum shed and losing my hair like crazy around 3-3.5month postpartum. I know it is normal but the amount was much more than with my first child. I started taking these and within 3 days my hair loss has significantly decreased! I wish I started taking these from my first day postpartum.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Postnatal/Prenatal
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the best postnatal I have ever taken! I also took their prenatal vitamins previously. Typically I don’t notice much from multivitamin but this brand made me feel noticeable better.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler C.

customer_reviews.title: 3 pills
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize a daily dose was 3 pills. Taking one large grassy pill would be fine, but 3 per day becomes a chore.
customer_reviews.author: hannahmitt

customer_reviews.title: trying to find a better post natal
customer_reviews.text: I really wish these did not have folic acid in them, trying to find a better post natal product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My baby became quite constipated
customer_reviews.text: After taking for a few days my new breastfed only baby became quite constipated. I have asked for a refund as I am no longer going to take these.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Stanphill

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these vitamins!!!! This is my third baby and I struggled with hair loss previously. I have had zero loss since taking this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on stomach
customer_reviews.text: These and the prenatal vitamins are the only ones that don’t make me feel nauseas. I can tell they help slightly increase my supply.
customer_reviews.author: nickolai

customer_reviews.title: A variety of essential vitamins that are necessary for healthy nursing and overall health!
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended these by a friend and I haven’t stopped taking them since! I’ve noticed a dramatic increase in my milk supply, and I have noticed a difference in my energy throughout the day. Overall, these vitamins are just what a mama needs! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Shiner

customer_reviews.title: So far I love how these vitiamin make me feel
customer_reviews.text: So far I love how these vitiamin make me feel. I have more energy and feel like my baby is getting all of the nutrition needed by filling in the gaps that my diet leaves. I would definitely suggest that new moms trade in their prenatal for this awesome natural postnatal vitiamin! They are so complete that you can eat them on an empty stomach without negative reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product through amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can take these on an empty stomach and all at the same time. I also think they improve my mood, of all things. I’m pleased with the product through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Milk supply
customer_reviews.text: This increased my milk supply by a ton. I bought this and then was just curious and bought another supplement to see which one I liked better and came right back to this one. Now I am making a ton of more milk again just by taking this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a good product. Seems to work better then the prenatals i had from cvs. I could tell a difference in hairs and hair
customer_reviews.author: Amy K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamins. I’ve have maintained a good supply for the past 6 months, not sure if it is related or not. Also, I have had trouble in the past with vitamins causing an upset stomach, but I’ve had no issues with these.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany J Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Tea bags in a pill!
customer_reviews.text: So far my hair hasn’t fallen out! Taste is none existing. Big medium thick pills but easy to swallow, to me!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha lewis

customer_reviews.title: Noticed a slight increase in my supply and an overall ...
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a slight increase in my supply and an overall difference in how I feel. I pump at work, so I am able to quantify what I am producing. It helps with my energy level during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always happy.
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins, they don't make my stomach hurt if I don't eat with them. The brand is fantastic. I have purchased all my prenatal, and postnatal vitamins from them and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Mast

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love them. Grows healthy babies
customer_reviews.text: Best quality prenatal vitamin. I still take them even when not pregnant
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t taste bad
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow, don’t taste bad, no side effects. I take them before bed, so I don’t always have food in my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Brookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin and milk booster!
customer_reviews.text: These are great post natal vitamins and I think they help maintain my milk supply!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really helped with my milk supply
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my son’s pediatrician. It has been great for my milk supply. I wish I had this with my other 2 kids.
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Easy health
customer_reviews.text: Love these. The probiotics helped not just me but baby as well. I will use them as long as I breastfeed.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Contains SOY
customer_reviews.text: These looked amazing but my little one has a soy allergy so I gave them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: CharlestonKatie

customer_reviews.title: Best Postnatal Vitamins Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins. Whole food vitamins, with probiotics, non-gmo AND they provide ENERGY on top of the postnatal support! WIN WIN WIN!!!
customer_reviews.author: RV's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality vitamins, bottle is too fragile
customer_reviews.text: I do like the quality of the vitamins, but my third time ordering the glass bottle was shattered unfortunately. I’ll keep ordering, but it was a pain to deal with
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Allspach

customer_reviews.title: Magic pills
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many Prental and postnatal vitamins. These are by far the best. I love how I can take them on an empty stomach and not feel sick. I feel that my milk supply has increased. When I run out I feel less energetic and even irritable. I can't survive mommyhood without these!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping addict

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I feel so good when I take these. Just what I needed. Boosts my energy and mood.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra D

customer_reviews.title: I like the energy it gives me
customer_reviews.text: These work great for me. Gives me the energy I need and a has no bad effects on my milk supply like it has for some. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: desiree deliz

customer_reviews.title: Helps me "go" and overall a wonderful vitamin. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Gives me energy, keeps me going throughout the day. Keeps my mood stable and upbeat. Non disruptive to your tummy. Helps me "go" and overall a wonderful vitamin. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. .bought that

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I recommend taking these vitamins in different settings and not all at once. They are quality vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great postnatal.
customer_reviews.text: Gives all great nutrients and it can be taken on an empty stomach which is great.
customer_reviews.author: N. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Glass everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a completely smashed and broken container. I would like a refund and I can not take these they are filled with broken glass
customer_reviews.author: Stephen smit

customer_reviews.title: I really appreciate the postnatal idea. Especially for breastfeeding ...
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the postnatal idea. Especially for breastfeeding. Friends and family had no idea such a thing existed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good postnatal
customer_reviews.text: Already have been through a whole bottle and reordered more, seems to be working
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this is the absolute BEST postnatal vitamin! I also loved their prenatal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that they made supplements designed for postnatal
customer_reviews.text: I love that they made supplements designed for postnatal. They are different from the prenatal vitamins that I took. Much better for nursing mothers in my opinion. My supply has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large and don't taste very good.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little too large to swallow, and you have to take more than one for each serving size. Makes it hard to want to keep taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Really helped with my mood swings
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Ever since I started taking them I’ve felt myself doing much better coming out of postpartum, definitely also helped with my milk production.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Glad I'm getting post-natal nutrition without much extra effort
customer_reviews.text: Instructions read to take three per day. Glad I'm getting post-natal nutrition without much extra effort!
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Gave me headache
customer_reviews.text: I didnt notice my supply getting better, and they have me terrible headaches...one a day for a whole week...I had to return!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Zebrowski

customer_reviews.title: Really like these
customer_reviews.text: Really like this brand. Switched over from the prenatal after my daughter was born. I feel like it did help my milk supply as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I can really tell a difference in my energy and stress levels when on this. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mshaw

customer_reviews.title: The vitamin itself is good, but the bottle I received came in a ...
customer_reviews.text: The vitamin itself is good, but the bottle I received came in a crushed box, with the lid off and the safety seal peeled away.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take, did not make me feel nauseous and kept me feeling good
customer_reviews.author: Megan Licata

customer_reviews.title: I love these pills but I wish I only needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these pills but I wish I only needed to take one a day. Who has time to take 3 times a day?
customer_reviews.author: Mircat

customer_reviews.title: New Chapter has sold me on food-based vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I like these postnatal vitamins. Note that you need to take 3 of these per day, and they don't have DHA so you will need to take that separately. I don't love taking 4 pills daily (the postnatal plus a DHA capsule) but I really feel that these are better than other vitamins. Honestly I'm not sure how different the postnatal pill is from the prenatal pill, but I switched after having the baby. During pregnancy, I stopped getting charlie horses after I began taking the "Perfect Prenatal" pills. I do believe it helped with my pregnancy anemia as well. So I am sold on this food-based vitamin!!
customer_reviews.author: Cosette

customer_reviews.title: close to expiration
customer_reviews.text: bought Feb 2019 but received a product that expires June 2019
customer_reviews.author: Melanie P.

customer_reviews.title: 3 huge pills / decreased milk.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the suggestion of my IBCLC for milk increase. Since taking, my milk has decreased. And they're so hard to swallow. They get hung in my throats every night (and I took rainbow light prenatals).
customer_reviews.author: Marlissa

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF GASSY BABY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started these when my daughter was 8 weeks. She was the happiest baby prior to this and turned into a fussy, vomiting terror! She literally could not sleep. It took me 3 weeks to figure out the problem (I feel stupid now). I went to a lactation consultant because I thought the cause was a food allergy or her latch. We were able to pinpoint the vitamins and after about 2-3 days of stopping she was back to her happy self! I was told it is due to the fermented ingredients which the pediatrician actually thought was very strange that they would even ferment them. I DO NOT RECOMMEND! Stick to your prenatals.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Freiling

customer_reviews.title: feeling super sluggish and out of it
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins really helped me over the past year postpardum as I continued to breastfeed my son. I was in a real funk before I started taking them, feeling super sluggish and out of it. I eat a healthy diet, but that just didn't seem to be enough. I noticed a huge improvement with my energy levels after starting to take these. I'm still breastfeeding my 17 month son and taking them, and I plan to use them again when/if I have a second.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rennie

customer_reviews.title: I recommend them!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are great! No bad feeling when taking them. I'm happy I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and didn't set my hopes too high but after a couple days I did notice my pumping output increase. They do not cause upset stomach when taking them on an empty stomach. Great product. Unfortunately, they do contain soy and I found out my son has a dairy and soy protein intolerance and these upset his tummy:( otherwise, I loved them!
customer_reviews.author: ricky miller

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend these for postnatal care
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend these for postnatal care. They are wonderful for recovering mothers. Plus, they have add vitamins to help calm you/baby and increase milk supply for nursing. This price on Amazon was $10 less than the health food store.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well for me
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when New Chapter came out with this postnatal multivitamin because during my first pregnancy I took the New Chapter prenatal and felt great. However, my experience with this postnatal was unfortunately not good. I became severely nauseous when taking these, and to make sure it was coming from the postnatal I took it for three days with no other vitamins or fish oil. After stopping I was immediately relieved from the nausea. Although it did not work for me it may work well for others. I liked the fact that these are non-gmo, the herbal blend is organic, and it is easily digestible even on an empty stomach.
customer_reviews.author: DIA

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: Its okay. I was hoping my hair didn't fall out as much... but its okay
customer_reviews.author: kmaragh

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay. Somehow got signed up for auto-refill. ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay. Somehow got signed up for auto-refill. I don't remember agreeing to it, and it's been a pain trying to find a way to contact a human, or even a simple email.
customer_reviews.author: jamie antonetti

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed. I received these and when I tried to remove the cotton that is in the bottle, about ten pills got stuck to the cotton and I had to take it off one by one. The cotton was extremely hard to remove and there are still some on the pills.
customer_reviews.author: K

product_meta.title: New Chapter Postnatal Vitamins, Lactation Supplement With Fermented Probiotics + Wholefoods + Vitamin D3 + B Vitamins + Organic Non-gmo Ingredients - 96 Ct
product_meta.description: Size:96 Count (Pack of 1)Your baby is born, and your world is changing in incredible ways. As you begin this new journey together, New Chapter will help take care of you as you care for your new baby. Our unique 3-in-1 multivitamin + Multimineral + multiherbal probiotic-fermented formula is made especially to give busy moms consistent nutritional support, and includes lactation support for nursing moms. you can rest easy knowing your postnatal vitamin is made with Organic, non-GMO ingredients. Because ingredients matter. Other ingredients: Ferment media (organic soy flour, organic gum acacia, organic Saccharomyces cerevisiae, organic maltodextrin, organic orange peel powder, organic molasses, organic carrot powder, lactic acid bacteria [Lactobacillus acidophilus, Bifidobacterium bifidum and Lactobacillus rhamnosus], papain (deactivated), bromelain (deactivated), organic alfalfa powder and organic safflower oil), organic gum acacia, silicon dioxide, magnesium stearate, lac resin and carnauba wax.
feature_bullets: Expertly formulated for new moms - postnatal vitamins & minerals to support lactation, energy & Mood
Gentle on your stomach and fermented with beneficial probiotics
3-In-1 complete formula: multivitamin, Multimineral & Multiherbal. For DHA while nursing, add New Chapter Wholemega for moms fish oil
Clean, pure, whole-food ingredients include Organic superfoods such as Turmeric, Oats, and kelp
Made with Certified Organic Vegetables & Herbs, Non-GMO Project Verified, Vegetarian, Kosher, Gluten Free, No synthetic Fillers, No Animal Gelatin (added to some Prenatal gummy vitamins)
